content: I didn\'t know if I had it coming . I\ 've been searching for a good guy and finally found it , I\ 'm excited to bring his life to the next level ! I\ 'm so glad I\ 'm finally making it . This is the first time I\ 've ever realized I have all the same feelings for people as I did when I was a kid . I\ 've been in love with this guy for almost a year now , and he doesn\'t even know I\ 'm my best friend . I wanted to be a normal kid , but this is the first time I\ 've ever felt that way in my life . I want to be a grown woman , but I\ 've never been that way before . I\ 'm just a guy that struggles to control his emotions .

`` I don\'t know what to do about it because I haven\'t read the book yet . I\ 'm just going to sit back and let the tables turn and enjoy myself . My best friends are having so much fun with me . '' `` I feel like I\ 'm being introduced to a new person in my life . I\ 've never felt this uncomfortable before . I got to meet new people before myself and now I\ 'm just waiting for them to be introduced to me .
